tituloGenerar:
Build your map
straight from a spreadsheet.
requisito3a: And if you wish to use more than markers, you will need to know something about
descPaso1: Crate a new spreadsheet from the template
textoPaso1: You need to be logged in to your Google account to save a copy of the spreadshit in your Drive.
textoPaso2a: Once you've made a copy of the map template and applied your modifications to the markers to see how it works, you have to
publicar1: Select Publish to the web on the File menu.
